about_the_game:
■Outline

A new agent, Lynette, is asked by the government to investigate an abandoned village.
She tries to join up with Lloyd, who went to the abandoned village before her, but..."

■Game Content

Take control of Lynette and investigate the abandoned village.
You'll need to find out everything you can about the place.
You never know what might be out there, so always be ready to fire your gun.
Gamepad recommended!
This game contains sexual and violent scenes and grotesque expressions.

■H scenes etc.

HCG, 18 dot animations

※Gallery available
The gallery will be released gradually according to the progress of the game.

[/h2]■List of Cheats and Hidden Commands[/h2]
You can switch on/off anywhere by entering the following commands.

Infinite weapon ammo Press A quickly 3 times

Creature Voice Press ↓ 3 times quickly

Reminiscence Mode: Press ↑ three times quickly.

※When you turn on reminiscence mode, you can view the gallery from the save terminal.
　The gallery will be released gradually as you progress through the game.
　If you want to save the game, please turn it off.

■Controls


Move: ← or →.

Jump: X

Evade: F

Hold your weapon: S
Upper stance: Hold S and move up *Handgun only
Lower stance: Hold S and move down *only handguns

Fire: Z while pressing S

Switch weapons: D
　　
Decide and check: Z

Check possessions: C



※Save to regain all your health.
　There are no recovery items.

※When the game is over, use the spacebar to return to the title.
　You can also use the spacebar to return to the title at any time, even if the game is not over.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Extra Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

detailed_description:
■Outline

A new agent, Lynette, is asked by the government to investigate an abandoned village.
She tries to join up with Lloyd, who went to the abandoned village before her, but..."

■Game Content

Take control of Lynette and investigate the abandoned village.
You'll need to find out everything you can about the place.
You never know what might be out there, so always be ready to fire your gun.
Gamepad recommended!
This game contains sexual and violent scenes and grotesque expressions.

■H scenes etc.

HCG, 18 dot animations

※Gallery available
The gallery will be released gradually according to the progress of the game.

[/h2]■List of Cheats and Hidden Commands[/h2]
You can switch on/off anywhere by entering the following commands.

Infinite weapon ammo Press A quickly 3 times

Creature Voice Press ↓ 3 times quickly

Reminiscence Mode: Press ↑ three times quickly.

※When you turn on reminiscence mode, you can view the gallery from the save terminal.
　The gallery will be released gradually as you progress through the game.
　If you want to save the game, please turn it off.

■Controls


Move: ← or →.

Jump: X

Evade: F

Hold your weapon: S
Upper stance: Hold S and move up *Handgun only
Lower stance: Hold S and move down *only handguns

Fire: Z while pressing S

Switch weapons: D
　　
Decide and check: Z

Check possessions: C



※Save to regain all your health.
　There are no recovery items.

※When the game is over, use the spacebar to return to the title.
　You can also use the spacebar to return to the title at any time, even if the game is not over.
name: Malicious Reload

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A new agent, Lynette, has been asked by the government to investigate an abandoned village. She tries to join up with Lloyd, who has already gone to the abandoned village, but...
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
